title: Fee payment and modes
text: Fees charged semester-wise in advance; payable via DD, PayTM, BHIM, UPI, Netbanking, Student Portal, Cash, POS; online payments must be emailed to Accounts with transaction details same date.

title: Brainware Vidyalankar & Medha Britti
text: Scholarships for meritorious students (e.g., 90-94.99% = 50% tuition waiver; 95%+ = full tuition waiver); specific exclusions apply; only one Brainware scholarship allowed per student.
